trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Enable-WSManCredSSP
trans-unit.target: Enable-wsmancredssp

trans-unit.source: Enable-WSManCredSSP
trans-unit.target: Enable-wsmancredssp

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Enables CredSSP authentication on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 可讓電腦上的 CredSSP 驗證。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Enable-WSManCredSSP** cmdlet enables Credential Security Support Provider (CredSSP) authentication on a client or on a server computer.
trans-unit.target: **Enable-wsmancredssp** 指令程式可讓用戶端或伺服器電腦上的認證安全性支援提供者 (CredSSP) 驗證。

trans-unit.source: When CredSSP authentication is used, the user credentials are passed to a remote computer to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CredSSP 驗證時，使用者認證會傳遞至遠端電腦進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: This type of authentication is designed for commands that create a remote session from another remote session.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型的驗證被針對從另一個遠端工作階段建立遠端工作階段的命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to run a background job on a remote computer, use this kind of authentication.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要在遠端電腦上執行背景工作，使用這種驗證。

trans-unit.source: Use this cmdlet to enable CredSSP on the client by specifying Client in the *Role* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個指令程式所指定的用戶端，用戶端上啟用 CredSSP *角色* 參數。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式會執行下列動作︰

trans-unit.source: Enables CredSSP on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端上啟用 CredSSP。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet sets the WS-Management setting **\<localhost|computername\>\Client\Auth\CredSSP** to true.
trans-unit.target: 此指令程式會設定 Ws-management 設定 **\<localhost | computername\>\Client\Auth\CredSSP** 設為 true。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Windows CredSSP policy **AllowFreshCredentials** to WSMan/Delegate on the client.
trans-unit.target: 設定 Windows CredSSP 原則 **AllowFreshCredentials** 為 WSMan/Delegate 用戶端上。

trans-unit.source: These settings allow the client to delegate explicit credentials to a server when server authentication is achieved.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定可讓用戶端將明確宣告的認證委派給伺服器 (當達成使用伺服器驗證時)。

trans-unit.source: Use this cmdlet enable CredSSP on the server by specifying Server in *Role*.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個指令程式藉由指定伺服器在伺服器啟用 CredSSP *角色*。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet performs the following action:
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式會執行下列動作︰

trans-unit.source: Enables CredSSP on the server.
trans-unit.target: 在伺服器上啟用 CredSSP。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet sets the WS-Management setting **\<localhost|computername\>\Service\Auth\CredSSP** to true.
trans-unit.target: 此指令程式會設定 Ws-management 設定 **\<localhost | computername\>\Service\Auth\CredSSP** 設為 true。

trans-unit.source: This policy setting allows the server to act as a delegate for clients.
trans-unit.target: 此原則設定可讓伺服器做為用戶端的委派對象。

trans-unit.source: Caution: CredSSP authentication delegates the user credentials from the local computer to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ CredSSP 驗證使用者認證從本機電腦委派給遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: This practice increases the security risk of the remote operation.
trans-unit.target: 此做法會使得遠端作業的安全性風險變高。

trans-unit.source: If the remote computer is compromised, when credentials are passed to it, the credentials can be used to control the network session.
trans-unit.target: 若遠端電腦遭到入侵，當認證被傳遞給它時，該認證便可用來控制網路工作階段。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Delegate client credentials
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 用戶端認證委派

trans-unit.source: This command allows the client credentials to be delegated to the server02 computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令允許將用戶端認證委派給 server02 電腦。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Delegate client credentials to all computers in a domain
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 用戶端認證委派給網域中的所有電腦

trans-unit.source: This command allows the client credentials to be delegated to all the computers in the accounting.fabrikam.com domain.
trans-unit.target: 此命令允許將用戶端認證委派給 accounting.fabrikam.com 網域中的所有電腦。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Delegate client credentials to multiple computers
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 用戶端認證委派給多部電腦

trans-unit.source: This command allows the client credentials to be delegated to multiple computers.
trans-unit.target: 此命令允許將用戶端認證委派給多部電腦。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Allow a computer to act as a delegate
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 允許電腦做為委派

trans-unit.source: This command allows a computer to act as a delegate for another.
trans-unit.target: 此命令允許電腦做為另一部電腦的委派對象。

trans-unit.source: The **Enable-WSManCredSSP** cmdlet, shown in the earlier examples, only enables CredSSP authentication on the client, and specifies the remote computers that can act on its behalf.
trans-unit.target: **Enable-wsmancredssp** 指令程式，先前的範例所示僅啟用 CredSSP 驗證在用戶端，而且其代表指定可在遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: In order for the remote computer to act as a delegate for the client, the CredSSP item in the Service node of WSMan must be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓遠端電腦可做為用戶端的委派對象，必須將 WSMan 之 Service 節點中的 CredSSP 項目設定為 True。

trans-unit.source: This example sets the CredSSP item in the Service node of WSMan to true.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會設定為 true 的 WSMan 服務節點中的 CredSSP 項目。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Allow a computer to act as a delegate by using Set-Item
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 允許電腦做為委派，利用設定項目

trans-unit.source: This example allows a computer to act as a delegate for another computer.
trans-unit.target: 此範例可讓電腦可做為另一部電腦的委派。

trans-unit.source: The Enable-WSManCredSSP commands, shown in the earlier examples, enable CredSSP authentication only on the client computer, and they specify the remote computers that can act on behalf of the client computer.
trans-unit.target: Enable-wsmancredssp 命令，顯示在先前範例中，啟用 CredSSP 驗證只能在用戶端電腦上的，而且它們指定可代表用戶端電腦的遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: For the remote computer to act as a delegate for the client computer, the CredSSP item in the Service directory of the WSMan provider must be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓遠端電腦可做為用戶端的委派對象，必須將 WSMan 提供者之 Service 目錄中的 CredSSP 項目設定為 True。

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a connection to the remote server02 computer by using the Connect-WSMan cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令會使用 Connect-wsman cmdlet，以建立遠端 server02 電腦的連線。

trans-unit.source: The second command sets the credSSP value on the remote server02 computer by using the Set-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用 Set-item cmdlet，在遠端 server02 電腦上設定的 credSSP 值。

trans-unit.source: This value allows the remote computer to act as a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此值可讓遠端電腦可做為委派。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -DelegateComputer
trans-unit.target: -DelegateComputer

trans-unit.source: Specifies servers to which client credentials are delegated.
trans-unit.target: 指定用戶端認證委派的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Specify fully qualified domain names.
trans-unit.target: 指定完整的網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the *Role* parameter is Client, you must specify this paremter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 *角色* 參數是用戶端，您必須指定此 paremter。

trans-unit.source: If *Role* is Server, do not specify this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 *角色* 是伺服器，請勿指定這個參數。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Forces the command to run without asking for user confirmation.
trans-unit.target: 強制執行命令而不要求使用者確認。

trans-unit.source: -Role
trans-unit.target: 角色

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to enable CredSSP as a client or as a server.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要啟用 CredSSP，做為用戶端或伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are: Client and Server.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可接受的值如下︰ 用戶端和伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If you specify Client, this cmdlet performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定用戶端時，這個指令程式會執行下列動作︰

trans-unit.source: Enables CredSSP on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端上啟用 CredSSP。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet sets the WS-Management setting **\<localhost|computername\>\Client\Auth\CredSSP** to true.
trans-unit.target: 此指令程式會設定 Ws-management 設定 **\<localhost | computername\>\Client\Auth\CredSSP** 設為 true。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Windows CredSSP policy **AllowFreshCredentials** to WSMan/Delegate on the client.
trans-unit.target: 設定 Windows CredSSP 原則 **AllowFreshCredentials** 為 WSMan/Delegate 用戶端上。

trans-unit.source: These settings allow the client to delegate explicit credentials to a server when server authentication is achieved.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定可讓用戶端將明確宣告的認證委派給伺服器 (當達成使用伺服器驗證時)。

trans-unit.source: If you specify Server, the cmdlet performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定伺服器時，此 cmdlet 會執行下列動作︰

trans-unit.source: Enables CredSSP on the server.
trans-unit.target: 在伺服器上啟用 CredSSP。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet sets the WS-Management setting **\<localhost|computername\>\Service\Auth\CredSSP** to true.
trans-unit.target: 此指令程式會設定 Ws-management 設定 **\<localhost | computername\>\Service\Auth\CredSSP** 設為 true。

trans-unit.source: This policy setting allows the server to act as a delegate for clients.
trans-unit.target: 此原則設定可讓伺服器做為用戶端的委派對象。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not accept any input.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不接受任何輸入。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Xml.XmlElement
trans-unit.target: System.Xml.XmlElement

trans-unit.source: If CredSSP authentication is successfully enabled, this cmdlet generates an **XMLElement** object.
trans-unit.target: 如果順利啟用 CredSSP 驗證，此 cmdlet 會產生 **XMLElement** 物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: To disable CredSSP authentication, use the Disable-WSManCredSSP cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用 CredSSP 驗證，請使用 Disable-WSManCredSSP Cmdlet。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
